text: David P. Montgomery (June 26, 1946 â€“ May 8, 2019) was an American baseball executive. During his career, he held many roles at the Philadelphia Phillies. Montgomery and Bill Giles bought the Phillies for USD$30m in 1984. He was the chairman, minority-owner and president of the Major League Baseball (MLB) team. He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Montgomery died of cancer on May 8, 2019, at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Baseball executives Category:Businesspeople from Philadelphia Category:Deaths from cancer
title: David Montgomery (baseball)
